articles.content: The dressing room, Bruce Cassidy regularly noted, belonged to the players. Cassidy left Zdeno Chara, Patrice Bergeron, Brad Marchand, David Krejci and Tuukka Rask, the five ring-winners from 2011, al… [+4820 chars]

articles.title: Rickie Fowler fails to qualify for U.S. Open; 57-year-old Fran Quinn makes field - ESPN
articles.description: Fran Quinn, 57, qualified for the U.S. Open on Monday, while Rickie Fowler and former NFL running back Danny Woodhead were among the notables who failed to make the field for next week's major championship at The Country Club in Brookline, Massachusetts.
articles.content: POWELL, Ohio -- Fran Quinn last played the U.S. Open eight years ago with his teenage son as his caddie. He thought they might have a moment even more special on Monday as both of them tried to get t… [+4462 chars]

articles.title: Controversial replay costs Michigan in NCAA elimination game: ‘It really sucks’ - MLive.com
articles.description: A controversial call was a pivotal moment in Michigan's loss to Louisville in an NCAA regional final.
articles.content:

articles.title: Busy week of Tigers transactions will start on Tuesday - MLive.com

articles.content:
